column3: Greetings, adventurer. Is there something you require of me?
I am a conjurer of Stillglade Fane, sent here to assist the resident Hearer in conveying the will of the elementals to the people.
The Calamity left grievous wounds upon the Twelveswood. In order to rebuild without unduly hindering its recovery, it was decided that a new settlement would be founded here, upon the water.

This meant we did not have to encroach on the forest any more than was necessary. And what lumber we <Emphasis>did</Emphasis> require was taken sparingly and with all due consideration. So do we preserve the harmony between man and elemental─a harmony that I have the honor of facilitating.
As you can doubtless see for yourself, Fallgourd Float is a settlement built upon the water.
Situated along the highroad to Coerthas, it is favored as a waypoint for northbound merchants. All travelers are urged to experience the famed hospitality of the Bobbing Cork.

Alas, the number of visitors has seen a decline of late. It has proven exceedingly laborious to keep the roads and bridges leading hither in good repair, and the journey to Coerthas has grown perilous.
What kind of place is this?
